lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Masayoshi Ito, chairman of the LDP's policy affairs council, said yesterday the government must stick to its 1990 fiscal reform target, but should review the ceiling it places on public works spending.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Economists said the government could meet its 1990 target and also increase spending by using money it got from the sale of Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp shares and by taking advantage of lower than expected interest rates on its debt.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The economic package unveiled yesterday by the ruling Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) marks the start of a major shift away from the policies of the past, private economists and government officials said.

lst.name: sentence
